properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu twakusihi
upokee sadaka,
tuletayo mbele zako
twakuomba. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate na divai ni mazao
ya mashamba,
twayaleta mbele yako
twakuomba upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nafsi zetu twazileta,
twakuomba upokee.
Pia Baba zibariki,
Baba Mungu zitakase.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yote hayo twakuomba,
ubariki upokee.
Twakuomba Mungu wetu
sisi wanao twaomba.
